page.title: 16THE LOCAL POLICEMAN
page.content: The closest police station is at Looe, which has got cells in it.The policeman's duty is to go to accidents,talk to old people to make sure they are alright,to check on people and help people who have been threatened by outsiders.He always looks out for speeding cars and motor bikes.He keeps an eye on children playing football in the road or riding two on a bike,because it is very dangerous.He warns us not to steal or leave litter around or vandalise phone boxes or smash windows.He also warned us not to go with strangers,or to accept sweets from them.
